summary: Johnny fights the banker Burton, who tries to acquire with the help of the strange bandit Martinez, in an unlawful way, all the gold mines in the nearer environment.
cast: Giacomo Rossi Stuart|Krista Nell|Aldo Sambrell|George Wang|Silvio Bagolini|Mario Novelli|Diana Lorys|John Benedy|Furio Meniconi|Umberto Di Grazia|Vittorio Fanfoni|Lorenzo Piani|Romano Puppo|Andrea Ricca|Lilio Beato|Isarco Ravaioli|Laila Shed|Lorenzo Robledo|Antonio Jiménez Escribano|Francisco Bonmatí
title: Tequila
